name: @pretendonetwork/boss-crypto
description: TypeScript crypto functions for creating and working with WiiU and 3DS BOSS files

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && npx tsc && npx tsc-alias
scripts.test: npm run test-wiiu && npm run test-3ds
scripts.test-wiiu: npm run test-wiiu-encrypt && npm run test-wiiu-decrypt
scripts.test-3ds: npm run test-3ds-encrypt && npm run test-3ds-decrypt
